DOC.brief_summary: The Purpose study determine whether vitamin D3 supplement decrease muscle bone pain report woman take Aromatase Inhibitors .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D3 Effects Musculoskeletal Symptoms With Use Aromatase Inhibitors
DOC.detailed_description: This project determine efficacy vitamin D3 supplement reduce side effect treatment aromatase inhibitor woman history breast cancer evidence current disease . The aromatase inhibitor ( AI ) become critical component adjuvant therapy population , cause bone pain , joint pain , joint stiffness , muscle weakness approximately 40 % patient . These symptom , refer aromatase inhibitor-associated musculoskeletal symptom ( AIMSS ) , decrease quality life medication adherence . Identifying effective way decrease symptom may allow long adherent medication use thus may improve disease-free survival . We hypothesize vitamin D3 may decrease symptom associate use aromatase inhibitor .
